name: French Knight Rush
description: Exploits French faster [icon:villager] production. Fast [icon:feudal_age] Feudal Age into early [icon:knight] Royal Knight harassment.

steps.description: Queue [icon:villager] villagers. Send 6 starting villagers to [icon:sheep] sheep. [icon:rally] Rally [icon:scout] scout to find sheep.
1st new [icon:villager] builds [icon:house] house, then rallies to [icon:gold] gold.
Next [icon:villager] builds [icon:mining_camp] Mining Camp on [icon:gold] gold. Send following villager to gold too. (Total 3 on gold).
[icon:rally] Rally next new [icon:villager] to [icon:food] food. (Total 7 on food).
Next new [icon:villager] builds [icon:lumber_camp] Lumber Camp on [icon:wood] wood.
Rally next 3 villagers to [icon:food] food. (Total 10 on food).
[icon:feudal_age] Age up with [icon:school_of_cavalry] School of Cavalry! Use 2 [icon:villager] villagers from [icon:food] food to build.
Shift 2 villagers from food to [icon:wood] wood. Rally all new villagers to wood. (Total 5 on wood).
[icon:feudal_age] Feudal Age reached! Immediately produce [icon:knight] Royal Knights. Research [icon:upgrade] Chivalry when possible.
[icon:attack] Harass with 1st [icon:knight]. Target isolated villagers. Build [icon:archery_range] Archery Range for [icon:archer] Archer support.
